website_summaries.verdict: The best budget skimboard available to beginner and intermediate riders wanting something that lasts.
pros: Laminated, epoxy coating does a good job of preventing water from damaging the exterior surface
cons: Edges and surface can start to chip and peel if they catch on hard objects

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived quickly and the company emailed me the day it was delivered to see if I was satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son for his birthday. The item arrived quickly and the company emailed me the day it was delivered to see if I was satisfied with my purchase. I received another email a few days later just checking in on the product. This is a company that stands behind their product. My son expressed interest in skimboarding but we didn't want to invest in an expensive board if he didn't like it. This is a great board especially for beginners. I love that it doesn't need to be waxed. My son used it all weekend. Very happy with our purchase and with the customer service from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole J Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good shape and excellent surface
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this board. It is good for many hours of skimming on the beach. I never like the boards that required waxing, never held up and it is one more item you need to bring to the beach. This is the perfect product. Grip is good and I think this shape actually works better. Again, my son loves this board. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MarkN

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised, I thought I was ordering a board with built in foam pad grips.
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised, disappointed! I order the board with foam gripping for $48 and I got a all wood board that still needs traction pads! I saw pictures In the reviews on this listing of a board with foam grip and this is not the case, had a 1 small nick in the board.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loved this board. It took him some time to figure it out but that was also fun. He took to it within 1/2 an hour and the fun lasted several hours. It is a good quality. We have used it several times and it is still in good shape. My son is the true test of quality!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent board for the price, but quality doesn't seem amazing
customer_reviews.text: The product looks like a decent skimboard, but the varnish on the bottom of the board is poorly applied. I saw the high rating this product had when I bought it, and was unpleasantly surprised to see a disconnect with the quality in person. The board has marks and discolorations along the bottom as well as patchy varnish, which means the board might have "sticky patches" where the unvarnished portions come into contact with the sand. I may simply return it and wait for a new one, since this one may be a mistake, but I would still take into consideration that this is a very cheap skimboard, so don't expect a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boards are awesome. We have both a colored board with the foam grip and the wooden one. My boys love using them on the carpet in the living room. We have yet to take them to the beach(waiting on warmer weather). The company is awesome!!! I contacted them and they went above and beyond to fix the problem. Very happy with this purchase and the company. Will definitely be purchasing from them again.
customer_reviews.author: myralou

customer_reviews.title: Putting Gator to the test
customer_reviews.text: The board endured a mere three hours at beach, shared among three under weight 13 year old boys. Let's see if Gator steps up to remedy.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Rosner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed child
customer_reviews.text: We used it one time in Cannon Beach for 1 hour and it started coming apart For the money it should of lasted a couple uses. I 5 star ⭐️ pretty much everything so you know if I complain it’s legit
customer_reviews.author: Miker

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly great. Good grip, and nice size and weight. We have a small amount of delamination going on one edge. Doesn't effect performance now, but concerned about long term quality. Update: 1 year later. Delamination seems to be a non-issue. No further progression, very small area, doesn't affect it at all.
customer_reviews.author: AbqPhil

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking around this price range for a skimboard, get this one. You won't be disappointed. I'm 210 lbs and I have no problem with this board. Solid, glides really well, stable, good grip. This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: RD Snyder

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking board, fun for two days, until the paint started chipping off of the edges and you can see that the water is penetrating into the wood. I would guess that the paint and epoxy coating on top are not a high quality finish and really just not meant to last. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Lovehiking

customer_reviews.title: learning curve
customer_reviews.text: I'm 50 and just moved to Oregon. Not keen on 60 degree water. So I thought I would play in the shallows. The kiddy pool should be safer - right :o) Board looks GREAT. I can't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: tntbicycle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality board. Our family took 2 of these on our vacation to the Washington coast. The kids and adults had a great time skim boarding. The foam top held up and is great because you don't have to worry about buying separate pads or wax.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for a good price
customer_reviews.text: My 15-year-old son had an awesome time on his skimboard while we vacationed in the Outer Banks, NC. He had no previous experience on one, but got really good. He is about 6'1 and 155 lb. The board held up after a full week of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Krauklis

customer_reviews.title: The day I got it it had no scratches or anything like that and came really fast
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok skimboard. It is what you paid for and in my opinion was worth it. The day I got it it had no scratches or anything like that and came really fast. The reason I am giving this four stars instead of five is because its really light and not easy to control when skimming. Its no DB skimboard but is really good for its price, and is good for tons of fun.
customer_reviews.author: David Pool

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this board as a gift for a 12 year old boy who is a beginner skimboarder. He loves the board, it has held up well, it is big enough that he can easily step on and ride. The grip on the top is perfect (no wax needed).
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Worked well!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first skimboard we have ever owned or tried. My 10 year old got the hang of it and had fun. It seemed to work great. The bigger kids had a harder time using their board (it was bigger) but I think it was user error as opposed to the product. They both seemed sturdy and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: artsygirl

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the color, size and ease of use. We took it on vacation to the beach and fun was had by the whole family with it.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Lagos

customer_reviews.title: ... son based on reviews and we are both very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 9 year old son based on reviews and we are both very happy with the purchase. The board is nice and light with slightly padded surface for comfort. My son used 3 straight days -- all day and no signs of wear/tear. Very happy w/packaging and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Good times
customer_reviews.text: Our 11yo had a blast on this board in Cancun. We liked how he didn’t have to mess w waxing the top. It held up great to a week of being crushed in waves in Cancun. It didn’t take him long to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bobe

customer_reviews.title: Killing it in Matagorda
customer_reviews.text: Age 9 to 16, beginner skimmers killing it in Matagorda. Contact me for marketing ideas 😂❤️
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Great product/seller
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time and seller contacted me to make sure I had received it. It is a nice looking board. My 15 year old had to try a couple times to get the hang of it but he loves it. It is a fun item to have on the beach. I will be ordering another one for friends to use when they come with us.
customer_reviews.author: Terri V.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised but probably too small for most kids
customer_reviews.text: It was as advertised but a little difficult for the size for a 5, 6, 7 year old to use. The right size kid is probably too young to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ibburnk18cnu

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson. He is new to skimboarding. Went to Siesta Key yesterday. He LOVES it. A couple of kids on the beach mentioned how much nicer his board was than theirs. He just beamed. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: william hennig

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. I just hope it lasts for the younger ones coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good skim board
customer_reviews.text: Decent skim board. Hard to rate it as my son uses it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Gator Skimboard arrived on time and is a birthday gift for my grandson. He will be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Ready

customer_reviews.title: Nice board
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and arrived exactly as described. My son said he likes it better than the one we bought him from a beach store last year.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my 8 year old son and 6 year old daughter and they loved it. Great quality, great price. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue Grip BPS Skimboard
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time as described and in great condition. Nice product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Ruperto

customer_reviews.title: Boys loved it
customer_reviews.text: They have not been able to use it yet, looking forward to the summer !
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Peguero

customer_reviews.title: Product was exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This skimboard is a birthday gift for our 8-yr-old grandson and it will make him very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Gmother of 4

customer_reviews.title: great board.
customer_reviews.text: great board..handles well.. wood holds up..took of one star because rubber seperated some, repaired with Goop glue..better than new
customer_reviews.author: helen m.

customer_reviews.title: Family owned company
customer_reviews.text: Friendly, family company contacted us immediately to make sure the order was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Gator Skimboards by BPS
customer_reviews.text: Although I liked the look of the board, it did not work out for me. The customer service was exceptional in resolving my purchase. Very professional and responsive business owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: We only used it one week last year and brought it back to the beach this year and it fell apart the first day. The wood started to separate and pull apart.
customer_reviews.author: AES

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The board came in perfect condition. We took it to the lake this weekend and the teenage boys had hours and hours of fun on it!
customer_reviews.author: Blake J.

customer_reviews.title: Came on time and in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son 15yrs old to use this summer at the outer banks was a surprise he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Carl M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product at a great price. We use these for a couple of weeks in the summer, so didn't want to spend a fortune, but wanted a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D

customer_reviews.title: Very well built!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My kid spent all day running and skimming on the Atlantic.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pinho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. excellent company to deal with. 'surf and snow' try them out. you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: lois mclenaghan

customer_reviews.title: Wax free board!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my tall 11 year old. "Totally rad!" No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: No rocker
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two skimboards, 30", one blue, one black. Two totally different shapes. The blue was flat and the black had a nice nose rocker. These are for my two grandkids coming tomorrow with no time to return. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gfire

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 and 1/2
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these. One is holding up fine (only been using it for 20 minutes. Other has already stated breaking. Mixed feelings.
customer_reviews.author: wateach

customer_reviews.title: The board arrived on time and looks good. We took it to the beach one time
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived on time and looks good. We took it to the beach one time, and my son is still figuring out how to use which seems normal.
customer_reviews.author: Maida

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet, but my boys and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but my boys and I should have a chance to put it to the test next week at the beach! Arrived as expected from Amazon and my boys are all about the bullet logo. Looking forward to lots of beach time with this board.
customer_reviews.author: Boys' mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: Nice board. Cool colors. Will make my grandson happy I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sizemore

product_meta.title: BPS 'Shaka' Skimboards with Colored EVA Grip Pad and High Gloss Clear Coat | Wooden Skim Board with Grip Pad for Kids and Adults | Choose from 3 Sizes and Traction Pad Color
feature_bullets: 'Shaka' Skimboards by BPS features its nose rocker for more maneuverability – making it easier for you to turn swiftly as you get more pivot. It is built with enduring plywood with a high gloss clear coating that protects the wood from water damage and breakage.
Built-In Grip Pads – This board features a Dot Patterned Grip layer of EVA foam so you do not have to put wax on your board as it already provides excellent grip especially when wet.

Beginners guide – New to skimboarding? No worries, we got your back! On top of an amazing skimboard, you will receive an email from us – containing the E-guide with easy-to-follow instructions written by our experts. We elaborate on how to get on the board and do some basic tricks properly. 30” skimboard is for riders up to 80lbs, 35” for riders around 80-150lbs, and 40” for riders over the said weight. Make sure you DON'T OPT-OUT from receiving emails from Amazon so you won't miss this.

Customer Care – You will receive an email from us to check if everything went well. We will also provide an Amazon email link to the business owner in case you may encounter any issues or may have any query. You can always reach out to us by selecting the highlighted 'Surf and Snow Warehouse' on ANY of our products (where it says 'sold by') - and then using the 'Have a question for Surf and Snow Warehouse' feature. We try very hard to respond within 12 hours.

Buy with complete confidence as all our products are stored and shipped to you by Amazon and are fully guaranteed for one year so if you are not satisfied with your purchase, just let us know. Thanks for looking at a product from our store – SURF and SNOW Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love -water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100% so if you have any questions about using any of our products please just ask.
